item.title: First Post
item.description: Welcome to my blog I have tried out a lot of platforms online like wordpress, weebly, wix, tumblr, etc. This is the next step. :) What will I post here? Did not think of anything yet. The posts can range from thought experiments, code guides and other stuff.
